game.name: NumberOne JukeBox
game.desc: Run JukeBox application. Place your mp3 files in the music folder set in the JukeBox configuration. The mp3 files need to have tags filled.

game.name: ✭ JukeBox Configuration
game.desc: RunJukeBox Configuration. Run to delete your old database and configure your controller buttons.
